snippet: The director of United Nations emergency relief implored the Security Council on Tuesday to find ways to ensure his aid teams can gain access to two isolated southern states of Sudan.
lead_paragraph: The director of United Nations emergency relief implored the Security Council on Tuesday to find ways to ensure his aid teams can gain access to two isolated southern states of Sudan.

headline.seo: Sudan: Top U.N. Aid Official Warns of Food Crisis in 2 Southern States
headline.main: Sudan: Top U.N. Aid Official Warns of Food Crisis in 2 Southern States
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Top U.N. Aid Official Warns of Food Crisis in 2 Southern States
